# Tuesday: Interactions and Categorical Predictors
Goals: 

* Explain the difference between an interaction model and stratification
* Identify how you can test a moderator using an interaction term
* Write a mathematical model that contains a categorical predictor using reference coding. 
* Interpret categorical predictor


## Prepare 
* Review the second half of the MLR notes [[HTML]](docs/lec07_MLR.html) [[PDF]](docs/lec07_MLR.pdf)
* PMA5 CH7.8 (interactions)
* PMA5Stratification (PMA5 7.9)

## In class
* Primarily lecture, board work on interpreting categorical predictors
* Time pending, work on the Regression Assignment [[HTML]](hw/Regression_Assignment.html), [[PDF]](hw/Regression_Assignment.pdf)
